title: FT: Waseda Japanese baseball team and Chinese team (BOTH SOLD)
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Waseda Japanese baseball team and Chinese team (BOTH SOLD)
posts.post_content:
### BOTH CARDS HAVE SOLD

Picked these up and know nothing about postcards. I’d like to trade these for t206 or caramel cards....but am kinda clueless on value.

If anyone has any info to share on these....please PM me.

Make an offer?!?!  And my apologies if the Japanese postcard inscription offends anyone. Definitely a different time.

[IMG]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1847/44647612541_00fff3cb17_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1858/44647614661_b2e1ffdc71_b.jpg[/IMG]
